contributors: Ghulām Ḥusayn Khān Ṭabāṭabāʼī, 1727 or 1728- author.
item.title: Jild-i avval Siyar al-mutaʼakhkhirīn, taṣnīf-i Sayyid Ghulām Ḥusayn Khān ibn-i Sayyid Hidāyatʹʻalīkhān Ṭabāṭabāī Ḥusaynī.
notes: Paper; cream-color Indian paper; black ink, some rubrication; text enclosed within border of two thin red lines; catchwords on rectos.

Note in pencil on endpaper: The text of this MS. extends as far as vol. 2, pg. 185, l. 23, of the second edition (Calcutta, 1902) of the English translation. It ends with the death of ʻAlī Hindī Khān (A.H. 1169).
Nastaʻliq; 15 lines in written area 17.3 x 9.6 cm.
19th century quarter leather binding; covers detached.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
summary: History of India in the 18th century.
medium: 371 leaves (15 lines), bound : paper ; 24.5 x 16 cm
other_title: جلد اول سير المتاخرين، تصنيف سيد غلام حسين خان ابن سيد هدايةعليخان طباطباي حسيني.
